text: Mohammad Ali Geraei (, born 2 May 1994) is a Greco-Roman wrestler from Iran. He won a gold medal at the 2018 Asian Games and a bronze medal at the 2017 and 2019 World Championships. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1994 births Category:Iranian male sport wrestlers Category:World Wrestling Championships medalists Category:People from Shiraz Category:Wrestlers at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in wrestling Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Iran Category:Asian Games competitors for Iran
title: Mohammadali Geraei
